code: import axios from'axios';const API_BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:4000/api';const api=axios.create({baseURL:API_BASE_URL,headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});api.interceptors.request.use(config=>{return config;},error=>{return Promise.reject(error);});api.interceptors.response.use(response=>{return response;},error=>{var _error$response;console.error('API Error:',((_error$response=error.response)===null||_error$response===void 0?void 0:_error$response.data)||error.message);return Promise.reject(error);});export const menuAPI={getAll:function(){let params=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};return api.get('/menu',{params});},getById:id=>api.get("/menu/".concat(id)),create:data=>api.post('/menu',data),update:(id,data)=>api.put("/menu/".concat(id),data),delete:id=>api.delete("/menu/".concat(id)),getCategories:()=>api.get('/menu/categories/list'),updateStock:(id,data)=>api.patch("/menu/".concat(id,"/stock"),data)};export const ordersAPI={getAll:function(){let params=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};return api.get('/orders',{params});},getById:id=>api.get("/orders/".concat(id)),create:data=>api.post('/orders',data),updateStatus:(id,status)=>api.put("/orders/".concat(id,"/status"),{status}),cancel:id=>api.delete("/orders/".concat(id)),getByNumber:orderNumber=>api.get("/orders/number/".concat(orderNumber)),getByCustomer:phone=>api.get("/orders/customer/".concat(phone)),getStats:()=>api.get('/orders/stats/summary')};export const healthAPI={check:()=>api.get('/health')};export default api;
